location.full_address: Tribble Gap Road, Cumming, Forsyth County, Georgia, 30040, United States

concerts.name: Beyoncé: COWBOY CARTER TOUR
concerts.info: No post-show refunds will be approved after 30 minutes of main act on stage. All seats were reviewed by the tour and any areas that were determined as significantly obstructed by production elements were accommodated with relocates. Fans who approached venue reps that were still unhappy were given the option to leave the show in order to receive a refund. No further requests can be considered.  Everyone needs a ticket for entry. Strongly recommend that you do not bring a bag on event day. Bags must meet the following criteria in order to enter the stadium: - must be CLEAR plastic, vinyl or PVC and not exceed 12 x 6 x 12 inches. Cannot be tinted with color or include oversized content that prevents visibility into the bag. - Only non-clear bags that are smaller than 4.5" x 6.5" will be permitted into the venue. - Any type of non-clear bag exceeding 4.5" x 6.5" will not be permitted. Exceptions made for medically necessary items after inspection onsite by security personnel.

concerts.name: GHOST: Skeletour World Tour 2025
concerts.info: This show will be a phone-free experience. Phones will be secured in Yondr pouches. Guests maintain possession of their phones at all times.
concerts.pleaseNote: This show will be a phone-free experience. Use of cellphones, cameras, or recording devices will not be permitted in the performance space. Upon arrival at the venue, all phones will be secured in Yondr pouches that will be opened at the end of the event. Guests maintain possession of their phones at all times and can access their phones throughout the event at designated Phone Use Area in the venue. All phones will be re-secured in Yondr pouches before returning to the event space. Anyone seen using a cellphone during the performance will be escorted out of the venue. Guests are encouraged to bring a bank or credit card for purchases inside the venue. We appreciate your cooperation in creating a phone-free viewing experience.

sports.name: Atlanta United FC v Chicago Fire FC
sports.info: Please note Everyone needs a ticket for entry, except children shorter than 33 inches do not require a ticket. For quickest entry into the stadium, we strongly recommend that you do not bring a bag on event day. If a bag is necessary, the bag must adhere to our Clear Bag Policy: - Bags must be CLEAR plastic, vinyl or PVC and not exceed 12 x 6 x 12 inches. Bags cannot be tinted with color or include oversized content that prevents visibility into the clear bag. - Only non-clear bags that are smaller than 4.5 x 6.5 in will be permitted into the stadium. - Any type of non-clear bag exceeding 4.5 x 6.5 in size will not be permitted.

sports.name: Tours: Truist Park
sports.pleaseNote: Tours begin based on the following schedule: In-Season (April-September/Playoffs) Monday - Saturday : 10:00am, 11:00am, 12:00pm,1:00pm, 2:00pm Sundays: 1:00pm, 3:00pm Off-Season (Oct-Mar) Mon-Sat: 10:00am, 12:00pm, 2:00pm Tours are 90 minutes in length. No Tours are given if a day game is being played. Please be sure to not only select the correct number and types of tickets, but also the time you want to attend.

sports.name: Gwinnett Stripers v. Jacksonville Jumbo Shrimp
sports.info: You are permitted to bring a small, clear bag inside the stadium for Gwinnett Stripers games. Coolray Field is a cashless venue. All major credit cards are accepted. All gates open one (1) hour prior to game time but are subject to change. Fans are encouraged to come out to Coolray Field early and enjoy pre-game festivities and ceremonies. All game details are subject to change.
sports.pleaseNote: For groups of 10 or more please call (678) 277-0340.

community.name: Dude Perfect Hero World Tour
community.pleaseNote: Ages 2 and older require a ticket. No Refunds. No Exchanges. Pricing, line up, and production setup may change without notice. Ticket purchases exceeding the posted ticket limit, either within a single order or across multiple orders, may be subject to order(s) being voided without notice. Las edades de 2 años o más requieren un boleto. Sin reembolsos. Sin intercambios. Los precios, la alineación y la configuración de producción pueden cambiar sin previo aviso. Las compras de boletos que excedan el límite de boletos publicados, ya sea dentro de un solo pedido o en múltiples pedidos, pueden estar sujetos a que los pedidos se anulen sin previo aviso.

community.name: PBR: Camping World Team Series Parking
community.info: Purchase Advanced Parking for your event, no refunds or exchanges. Note: purchases through an upsell are non- transferable. Should you wish to transfer your parking ticket to someone else, please purchase separately from tickets.
community.pleaseNote: Should you wish to transfer your parking ticket to someone else, please purchase separately from tickets.

community.name: PBR: Shark Cage Add-On
community.info: The Shark Cage is meant only for the bravest of fans! This is the ultimate experience to witness the top bull riders in the world in jaw-dropping competition against the best bulls in the industry. It is simply the most unique and engaging fan experience in sports! You are in the arena, on the dirt, and are surrounded by nonstop action! 8 seconds have never been so intense! -Ticket buyers will be in the cage for approximately 10-20 minutes to watch 8-10 rides. *Shark Cage experience is only available to those 16 years old and up. *This is an add-on ticket ONLY. A ticket for the event itself must be purchased prior to purchasing this add-on ticket
community.pleaseNote: ADD-ON ONLY: DOES NOT include an event ticket. An event ticket MUST be purchased for this add-on.

community.name: An Evening With Dan Carlin - Host Of Hardcore History
Skyline Lounge The Concert: A Tribute to ABBA
community.info: Skyline Lounge prior to The Concert: A Tribute to ABBA. THIS EVENT SPACE IS FOR AGES 21 AND OLDER. Add to your experience at Cobb Energy Centre with inclusive $55.00 price at all-new Skyline Lounge. This premium lounge features a custom bar and ample seating. Enhance your concert experience at the new Skyline Lounge at Cobb Energy Centre, furnished by Ashley Furniture. Located on the Grand Tier, this exclusive space offers an airy and inviting atmosphere with a stylish and comfortable bar area. For one inclusive price, your admission includes exclusive use of the lounge starting 90 minutes prior to showtime and during intermission (when applicable), access to a dedicated bar featuring exclusive specialty cocktails; two complimentary drinks: one spirit/beer/wine drink and one complimentary soft drink, coffee, or tea and a selection of chef-prepared hot and cold hors d'oeuvres. When a performance does not have an intermission, the lounge will close at showtime.

Ticket purchases exceeding the posted ticket limit, either within a single order or across multiple orders, may be subject to order(s) being voided without notice. community.name: Gwinnett 2045: Planning Tomorrow, Today
community.info: Gwinnett 2045: Planning Tomorrow, Today. is part of Gas South District Speaker Series presented by Northside Hospital to bring together community leaders for a thoughtful conversation about the past, present, and future of Gwinnett. Together, we will explore where we've been, where we are now, and where we must go to ensure our community continues to thrive. This engaging discussion will be moderated by Courtney Bryant of Fox 5 News, featuring panelists Kevin Carmichael (Senior VP of Economic Development, Partnership Gwinnett), Dr. Adrienne Simmons (Board of Education Chair, Gwinnett County Public Schools), Glenn Stephens (Gwinnett County Administer and Debbie Bilbro (CEO, Northside Hospital Gwinnett/Duluth). Purchase individual tickets or a group discount of 10 seats. Doors will open at 9:00am. Networking & Continental Breakfast: 9:00am-10:00am. Event Begins at 10:00am. Parking is included with your purchase.
community.pleaseNote: Doors will open at 9:00am. Networking & Continental Breakfast: 9:00am-10:00am. Event Begins at 10:00am. Parking is included with your purchase.

community.name: Disney On Ice 2025
community.info: There's nothing more special than sharing Disney magic with loved ones. Whether it's the first time you watched Toy Story, sang along to Let It Go, or cheered for your favorite Disney Princess, Disney On Ice is the perfect place to revisit cherished memories and create new ones together. Mickey, Minnie, Donald, and Goofy will take you on a journey through these unforgettable moments, powered by a Magical MousePad. Discover thrilling adventures from Zootopia, Inside Out 2, and the all-new Moana 2. Relive the timeless tales of Toy Story, Frozen, and Encanto, and the dazzling Disney Princesses. And hold on tight as Stitch grabs the Magical MousePad and shakes things up! Feel the excitement in an enchanted celebration close to home, only at Disney On Ice! *Note: Costumes not permitted for guests 14 years & older. Visit DisneyOnIce.com for more information.
community.pleaseNote: - All guests age 2 & older are required to have a ticket. - No costumes for guests 14 & older. - Character Experiences Available. Access to a private event with interactive time and photo opportunities. Adults & children, ages 2 and up, must have both a Character Experience ticket and a Disney On Ice show ticket to attend the Character Experience. Children must be accompanied by an adult. - Please monitor the venue website for venue policies, including health and safety protocols, which are subject to change. - All tickets are subject to availability. - Prices are subject to change. - Visit DisneyOnIce.com for more event info and Ticket Terms and Conditions.

all_events.name: WBB Georgia State vs Southern Miss
TM Host and Archtics In App Test 2024
Beyoncé: COWBOY CARTER TOUR
all_events.info: No post-show refunds will be approved after 30 minutes of main act on stage. All seats were reviewed by the tour and any areas that were determined as significantly obstructed by production elements were accommodated with relocates. Fans who approached venue reps that were still unhappy were given the option to leave the show in order to receive a refund. No further requests can be considered.  Everyone needs a ticket for entry. Strongly recommend that you do not bring a bag on event day. Bags must meet the following criteria in order to enter the stadium: - must be CLEAR plastic, vinyl or PVC and not exceed 12 x 6 x 12 inches. Cannot be tinted with color or include oversized content that prevents visibility into the bag. - Only non-clear bags that are smaller than 4.5" x 6.5" will be permitted into the venue. - Any type of non-clear bag exceeding 4.5" x 6.5" will not be permitted. Exceptions made for medically necessary items after inspection onsite by security personnel.

all_events.name: Bop To The Top (All Ages)
all_events.info: This is an all ages event. Doors at 8:00 PM. Show at 8:30 PM. Main floor is general admission standing. Balcony (if available) is general admission seating. GA floor has a pit area with limited capacity. GA ticketholders who arrive after the pit is full will be directed to other open areas on the floor or to the balcony.
